lyrics.stanza: He washed away my sins, Gave me a brand new heart; A heart to love Him, trust Him, Seek Him in His Word.
He tells me guard thy heart Above all that thou guardest; For out of it, flows the springs, The springs of life.
And sometimes when I fail, I forget that He's there; He's just waiting, watching, Then He draws me near.
